result.ga: Bíonn sí ag gearán go minic
result.orig: Bíonn sí ag gearán go minic
result.html: Bíonn sí ag gearán go minicShe is often complaining.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn sí ag gearán go minicShe is often complaining.

result.html: Fuair muid gearánWe received a complaint.
result.ponchtml: Fuair muid gearánWe received a complaint.

result.eng: She kept on complaining until she got an answer.
result.ga: Lean sí ag gearán léi go bhfuair sí freagra
result.orig: Lean sí ag gearán léi go bhfuair sí freagra
result.html: Lean sí ag gearán léi go bhfuair sí freagraShe kept on complaining until she got an answer.
result.ponchtml: Lean sí ag gearán léi go ḃfuair sí freagraShe kept on complaining until she got an answer.

result.html: Ná bí ag gearánDo not complain.
result.ponchtml: Ná bí ag gearánDo not complain.

result.eng: I made a compaint to the County Council.
result.ga: Rinne mé gearán leis an Chomhairle Contae
result.orig: Rinne mé gearán leis an Chomhairle Contae
result.html: Rinne mé gearán leis an Chomhairle ContaeI made a compaint to the County Council.
result.ponchtml: Rinne mé gearán leis an Ċoṁairle ContaeI made a compaint to the County Council.
